landing_page_introduction.title: 🏠 Landing Page Introduction (`ghosh.blog/soumitra`)
landing_page_introduction.intro: **Hi, I’m Soumitra Ghosh — a technologist, builder, and storyteller.**
landing_page_introduction.body:
I lead with curiosity, build with intent, and mentor with passion. Over the past two decades, I’ve helped scale fintech, adtech, and SaaS products, built high-performing engineering teams, and driven zero-to-one innovation across consumer and enterprise platforms.

Whether architecting neobanking systems, mentoring hackathons, or designing AI-first experiences, I bring a deep appreciation for tech that moves fast — but with purpose.

about_me.title: 👔 About Me
about_me.intro: **Technologist | Innovation Mentor | Builder of Zero-to-One Products**
about_me.body:
I’m Soumitra Ghosh, currently serving as the **VP of Engineering at Entropik**, where I lead product engineering in the space of AI-powered consumer research. Previously, I scaled RazorpayX from a fledgling API banking initiative to a robust payout platform with full-stack compliance, approval workflows, and multi-bank integrations.

Across roles at **Intuit, Razorpay, PayU, and Hyperion**, I’ve worked hands-on in system design, SaaS, microservices, and cloud-native architectures. I’ve been fortunate to lead and grow teams across India and the U.S., navigating both hyper-growth environments and deep tech pivots.

I’m an IIT Kharagpur alumnus (Electronics), a certified Scrum Master, and a recent graduate of ISB’s CTO Program.

roles.description: Spearheading GenAI transformation in consumer research, managing full-stack engineering and product execution.

Built and launched RazorpayX payout infrastructure from scratch. Led a 30-member team, implemented experiment-driven development, and shipped features like approval layers, fund transfer services, and new bank integrations.

Owned engineering for QuickBooks Online (QBO) Reports. Introduced report generation frameworks, chatbot-led reporting, and microservice re-architecture. Filed a patent in conversational data exploration.
Rebuilt the business intelligence engine for Operative.One. Key player in setting up the India engineering hub.
Part of the early team working on enterprise reporting and analytics tools. Later contributed to Guided Analytics initiatives.
IBM Global Services → Service Span → Hyperion USA → Hyperion India — foundational years spent building enterprise-grade software and distributed systems.

items.description: *"Data Exploration in QBO using Conversational Interfaces"*
*Real-time Eye Gaze Tracking for Interactive Research Experiences* — co-authored and presented as part of Entropik's research arm.
Regular mentor and judge at internal and external hackathons. Passionate about prototyping and guiding early-stage product ideas.

skills.Architecture Focus: Microservices, API Platforms, BI/Analytics, Compliance-Driven Systems.
skills.Tools of Choice: GitHub, Jira, Confluence, Postman, LangGraph, Docker, BigQuery.
